summary: A get-static-field-expression gets the value of a static field.
details: The field will be selected using the Static Field Resolution Algorithm.
Return Type: [type of the selected field]
Return the value stored in the field.
static-checks: The type specified by owner must exist.
The type specified by owner must be accessible.
The type of owner must be a declared-type.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val min = (field Integer::MIN_VALUE);%0A    val max = (field Integer::MAX_VALUE);%0A%0A    (F::println %22Integer Range: [%22 .. min .. %22, %22 .. max .. %22]%22);%0A}
